p: In muscle biopsies obtained from two confirmed CHIKV-infected patients with myositis, during the epidemic outbreak in the French island of La RÃ©union in 2006, infiltrating cells were mostly identified as monocytes/macrophages (CD68 staining) and T-cells (CD3 staining), and vacuolization of muscle fibers and fibrosis were detected. Although viral antigens are rarely searched for, CHIKV antigens were detected in this study in satellite cells (i.e., myoblasts), but not in muscle fibers [ 37].
